name: How To Destroy A Startup
description:
An educational game where you learn intellectual property law by destroying a thriving startup. Created by the Software Business Lab at Aalto University. Download the version of the game which corresponds to your operating system (Windows, Mac OSX). If you encounter problems, let your professor know and they will contact the developers.

CREDITS:

Timo Nyberg - Executive Producer
Yulia Guseva - Producer
Jesse Barksdale - Writer, Designer, Artist
Lassi Vapaakallio - Programmer, Designer
Philippe Pépin - Legal Consultant
Denis Zlobin - Sound Designer
Addtional Sound Effects - freesfx.co.uk
Made in association with the Software Business Lab, Finland
